title: Christine Lampard thought Coleen NOLAN was at war with Rebekah Vardy not Rooney
text:
It is the story which has shaken the showbiz and sporting worlds to their cores.

Yet Christine Lampard could not quite get her head around Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy's story leaking scandal when it first dropped on Wednesday as she believed it was her colleague Coleen Nolan who had began a war.

The fellow WAG, 40, who is married to football ace Frank Lampard, revealed on Thursday's Loose Women that she was left baffled when she thought her fellow panellist on the show was in fact at the heart of the WAG war.

Oh dear... Christine Lampard could not quite get her head around Coleen Rooney and Rebekah Vardy's story leaking scandal when it first dropped on Wednesday

On Wednesday, Coleen, 33, released an incredible social media statement aimed at Rebekah, 37, which revealed she set up an elaborate sting on Instagram to 'catch' who was leaking fake stories - in a move that sparked mass scandal.

Her dramatic revelation enthralled Britain and sparked an angry denial from pregnant Rebekah, who said 'I don't need the money’ and pointed out other people have had access to her Instagram account.

Speaking about her own reaction, a shocked Christine admitted: 'I have to say the day took a slightly different turn for me. I read it. 'I can't believe, it's extraordinary. We're going to speak about it on Loose Women...

'The whole time thinking it was Coleen Nolan. i did honestly. I realise there are clearly two Coleens. It was a slightly different take for me for three hours. then it took a different take as it went on.'

I got you: On Wednesday, Coleen, 33, released an incredible social media statement aimed at Rebekah, 37, which revealed she set up an elaborate sting on Instagram to 'catch' who was leaking fake stories (the WAGs pictured together in 2017)

Oh! 'The whole time thinking it was Coleen Nolan. i did honestly. I realise there are clearly two Coleens. It was a slightly different take for me for three hours. then it took a different take as it went on'

It has been revealed that Rebekah has hired a team of forensic IT experts to prove her innocence after Coleen accused her of selling stories to the press through information she obtained from her private Instagram.

Sources close to Rebekah say she is preparing to hit back and is working with her lawyers to prove she had nothing to do with the leak.

An insider exclusively told MailOnline: 'Rebekah has been incredibly stressed and hasn’t stopped sobbing all day, which is very out of character for her.

The full statement: Coleen made these shock claims on Instagram after discovering she had been betrayed by someone close to her and she concluded that it was Rebekah's account

'I don't need the money': Rebekah denied all accusations against her minutes after the post and said she had nothing to gain and had no financial motivation - she also slammed her for going public when she is heavily pregnant

'The whole situation has left her distraught and she still doesn’t understand why Coleen didn’t reach out to her first to ask her outright about the issue.

'She’s flying home early from Dubai as she feels her time abroad has been spoilt and all she wants is to be surrounded by family.

'Rebekah wants to prove she had nothing to do with the leaked stories and is working with a lawyer and IT experts who can look at the forensics of her Instagram, which several people have access to.'

A spokesman for Coleen said: 'It is irrefutable that the leaks came from one account, and one account only.'
